participant_1.background:
I love to visit websites about dogs and the rain.
i regularly go to the gym.
I haven't been in a fight, but I've been in situations where I felt threatened because of my sexuality.
i love to fish.
my favorite band is pink floyd.

participant_2.background:
I'd rather read my horoscope and write my own poems, thank you very much.
i love to paint pictures.
i can type 140 words per minute.
i grew up in the projects of chicago.
I like to go for long walks in the park with a cup of coffee in hand on the weekend.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there! How are you today?
I am doing well, thank you for asking. How about you?
I am doing well, thank you. Just getting ready to go for a walk in the park.
That sounds lovely. I love going for walks in the park.
Me too! It's a great way to relax and de-stress.
I agree. I also love to paint pictures.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
It's actually not that hard. There are a lot of great resources online that can help you get started.
I'll have to check them out. Thanks for the tip!
You're welcome! So, what are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to read, write, and go for long walks.
Those all sound like great ways to spend your time. I love to read too.
What are some of your favorite books?
I love all kinds of books, but I especially love historical fiction.
I've never really read much historical fiction. What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon. It's a historical romance set in the 1700s.
That sounds really interesting. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a great series.
Thanks for the recommendation!
You're welcome!
